summary: An ENB I worked on for a while, and a lot of people wanted it so here ya go.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#93c47d][size=3]I made an ENB a while back but never released it. I've been playing with it for a while now and really like it.
After uploading a few screens on Reddit people asked for it to be upload, so here.
I was hesitent at first because i didn't want some asshole putting people in a bad mood for no reason, and that ruins the whole thing, so don't do that.
[/size][/color]
Performance wise, I get around 50-60 most of the time, but in grass heavy areas it can drop to as low as 35. I have a fairly decent rig, so expect at least 30FPS(I really don't know because I don't have a million PCs to test on, this is what I get on my PC):

GTX770 2GB
i7 2600k @ 3.4Ghz
9GB RAM @ 1600Mhz
[color=#8e7cc3]
More images will be posted all the time, and feel free to post your own. If you like the ENB then please endorse and if you have any problems lemme know in the 'Posts' section.[/color]

[color=#c27ba0][size=5][b][i]If you don't like the Cinematic Bars, to disable them in-game you press shift+enter and go to the enbeffect.txt section and disable Letterbox Bars.
To turn ENB off ingame press shift+\.[/i][/b][/size][/color]

[size=4]The Name of the ENB is now called 'Mellon-Vana' ENB because if translated into elvish that means "Beautiful friend."[/size]

[color=#6d9eeb][b]Video Courtesy of Hodilton[/b][/color]
[youtube]vuyG9IAqaMQ[/youtube]

NEW FANTASY VERSION COMING SOON
[youtube]GWN9BKMgGJg[/youtube]


[color=#76a5af][size=3]Courtesy of mannygt[/size][/color]
[size=4][img]http://i.imgur.com/KECY0k7.jpg[/img][/size]


[color=#dd7e6b]***********************************************************************************************************************[/color]
[color=#dd7e6b][b][u][size=5]Install/Uninstall

TO INSTALL[/size][/u][/b]

1. Download[url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0264.htm] ENB Series v0.264 or above[/url], (the download button is on the bottom).

2. Extract [b]ONLY the d3d9.dll and the enbhost.exe [/b]from the [b]wrapper version [/b]to your Skyrim directory, (by default at C:Program Files (x86)/Steam/SteamApps/common/Skyrim).

3. Place enb Files into the Skyrim directory

4.Add optional files to skyrim directory if you want.

5. Add (or modify) these lines to your [b]SkyrimPrefs.ini[/b] file (located by default in C:/Users/xxxxxxx/Documents/My Games/Skyrim)
iMultiSample=0
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bShadowsOnGrass=1
bFloatPointRenderTarget=1

6. Set your enblocal.ini file for these two lines- [url=http://wiki.step-project.com/Guide:ENB#tab=Installation]For a tutorial Go here[/url]:
ReservedMemorySizeMb=xxx
VideoMemorySizeMb=xxxx

7. Open your Skyrim Launcher (NOT SKSE) and diasable ALL Anti-Aliasing and Anisotropic Filtering


[b][u][size=5]TO UNINSTALL[/size][/u][/b]
Delete all files you added from the enb
***********************************************************************************************************************[/color]
[b][u][color=#9fc5e8][size=4]Recommended Mods (All my Graphics mods)[/size][/color][/u][/b]

[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48290/?]Skyfix - Unique Inn Signs HD[/url]
